Layout Details - A Blend of Luxury and Functionality in Every Corner Ground Floor (70.38 m² net): A welcoming entrance leads to an open-plan living space that combines the kitchen, dining area, and living room – ideal for gatherings or relaxing with views of the pool. The spacious terrace with a pool, sun deck, and covered summer kitchen is perfect for outdoor enjoyment. The ground floor also includes a wardrobe, storage room, and guest toilet for added convenience. First Floor (68.11 m² net): An internal staircase leads to the upper floor featuring three bedrooms, each with its own ensuite bathroom. The master bedroom impresses with a walk-in closet and a private terrace offering panoramic views – a true retreat. High Construction Standards and Luxurious Features The villa is built to the highest standards, using premium materials such as 10 cm stone wool insulation, aluminum joinery, and glass railings on the terraces. Underfloor heating and air conditioning ensure maximum comfort in the living spaces, while all bedrooms are equipped with modern air conditioning units. Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.
